keyword: how many calories in a mcdonalds cheeseburger
title: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Cheeseburger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a mcdonalds cheeseburger, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Cheeseburger?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's cheeseburger: beef patty, American cheese, sesame seed bun, ketchup, mustard, pickles, onions; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on official McDonald's data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's cheeseburger contains 300 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Upgrade to double cheeseburger (extra patty and cheese)

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Approximately 300 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a McDonald's cheeseburger?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a McDonald's cheeseburger?
Are there trans fats in a McDonald's cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g of trans fat per cheeseburger.

faqs.q: How do customizations affect calories in a McDonald's cheeseburger?
faqs.a: Removing cheese saves ~50 kcal; adding bacon adds ~45 kcalâ€”check the app for exacts.
